response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. This product is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents an exceptional investment. I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe is a fair and advantageous proposition considering its immense worth to you. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 950000}
